title: What Riot could have done to balance DFG
body:
Original Deathfire Grasp

+120 ability power
+10% cooldown reduction
Active - Unique: Deals 15% of target champion's maximum health in magic damage and applies the debuff, Doom. Doom amplifies all magic damage that champion takes by 20% for 4 seconds. 90 second cooldown (750 range).



My Idea to balance Deathfire Grasp

+120 ability power
+10% cooldown reduction
Active - Unique: Applies the debuff Doom lasting for 2 seconds. Doom amplifies your next ability that champion takes by 10%. 60 second cooldown (750 range).


RIP DFG {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Doesn't do much for those mages who did a lot of that damage in one spell, however, it would have done a lot two nerf a lot of champions. I want to see what changes they make and what they make.

The problem they  had was the 15% nuke, 1/6th of your max health, then proceeded by the 20% damage amplification of ALL of your abilities.

With this the nuke has been removed, and the damage amplification only buffs one of your abilities.

When you think about it it does remove alot of the burst mages had before
